sentences.sentence: She is a nosey parker and is probably in the know.
sentences.translation: 她是个爱管闲事的人，可能知道内情的。

sentences.sentence: I was taking photos of a couple of trees and when I walked back to my car I was followed by this herd of nosey cows.
sentences.translation: 我正在拍摄两棵树的照片，当我走回汽车的时候，被这群爱管闲事的奶牛跟随着。

sentences.sentence: More importantly, it also allows nosey-parker anthropologists to formulate their prying questions in such a roundabout manner as to bypass the privacy rules.
sentences.translation: 更重要的是，这些谈资也让那些喜欢窥探别人隐私的社会学家巧妙地达到目的，同时不侵犯别人的隐私。
